Bash("/c/Users/Federico/anaconda3/python.exe" -c "
import sys
import os
import pandas as pd

# Check if data directory exists
data_dir = ''./data''
if os.path.isdir(data_dir):
    print(f''Data directory exists: {data_dir}'')
    print(''\nContents:'')
    for root, dirs, files in os.walk(data_dir):
        level = root.replace(data_dir, '''').count(os.sep)
        indent = '' '' * 2 * level
        print(f''{indent}{os.path.basename(root)}/'')
        if level < 3:  # Limit depth
            subindent = '' '' * 2 * (level + 1)
            for file in files[:5]:  # Max 5 files per dir
                print(f''{subindent}{file}'')
            if len(files) > 5:
                print(f''{subindent}... and {len(files) - 5} more files'')
else:
    print(f''Data directory does not exist: {data_dir}'')
")

Bash("/c/Users/Federico/anaconda3/python.exe" -c "
import re

with open(r''src\tdSynchManager\manager.py'', ''r'', encoding=''utf-8'') as f:
    content = f.read()

# Find LOCAL DB QUERY section
pattern = r''# \(BEGIN\)\s*# LOCAL DB QUERY(.*?)# \(END\)\s*# LOCAL DB QUERY''
match = re.search(pattern, content, re.DOTALL)

if match:
    section = match.group(1)
    # Count methods
    methods = re.findall(r''def (list_available_data|query_local_data)\('', section)
    print(''LOCAL DB QUERY group found!'')
    print(f''Methods in group: {len(methods)}'')
    for m in methods:
        print(f''  - {m}()'')
    print(''\nSuccess! Both functions have been added to the LOCAL DB QUERY group.'')
else:
    print(''LOCAL DB QUERY group not found!'')
")
